name: Usburner
description: Usburner is hardcore platformer (like Celeste or Super Meat Boy how others say) for mobile platforms. At the moment it's available only for android, but if I'll earn some money, Usburner will be released on IOS. So... You can ran away from chasing demon, collect contracts, coins, and just play for fun (but try not to smash your device after some deaths ;))
